GODS_CLSF_CD, NVL(SUM(SELL_AMT),0) AS OPPTY_SELL_AMT, NVL(SUM(BUY_AMT),0) AS OPPTY_BUY_AMT , BPIP.WCT_PRBB_CD, CNTR_DATE, BPIP.BOPT_STAT_CD, CASE WHEN BPIP.BOPT_STAT_CD = 'E' THEN 1 ELSE S.COM_CD_NUM_VAL END WCT_PRBB_VAL -- 계약완료는 수주확률 적용하지 않음 FROM BPIP000T BPIP JOIN BPIP020T BP02 ON BPIP.BOPT_ID = BP02.BOPT_ID JOIN APRJ000T APRJ ON APRJ.PRJT_ID = BPIP.PRJT_ID JOIN (SELECT * FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD = (SELECT COM_GRP_CD FROM ACOM020T WHERE CLMN_NM = 'WCT_PRBB_CD')) S -- 수주확률코드 ON S.COM_CD = BPIP.WCT_PRBB_CD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT HGRK_COM_CD,COM_CD FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'PM08' ) ACOM ON ACOM.COM_CD = BP02.GODS_CLSF_CD WHERE (BPIP.BOPT_STAT_CD = 'E' -- 계약완료 OR ( BPIP.FCST_RFLC_YN = 'Y' -- 사업예상반영여부 AND BPIP.BOPT_STAT_CD NOT IN ('E', 'F') -- E.계약완료, F.사업기회종료 제외 ) ) AND APRJ.PRJT_STAT_CD NOT LIKE 'F%' -- F1.사업이관, F2.사업폐기 AND APRJ.PRJT_STAT_CD NOT LIKE 'D%' -- D1.일반삭제, D2.중복삭제 GROUP BY BPIP.PRJT_ID, FCST_YAM, BPIP.BOPT_ID, BPIP.SLS_DEPT_ID, BPIP.SLS_EMP_ID,ACOM.HGRK_COM_CD,
PROD_TYPE_CD, -- ★상품실적현황인 경우
GODS_CLSF_CD,BPIP.WCT_PRBB_CD, CNTR_DATE, BPIP.BOPT_STAT_CD, CASE WHEN BPIP.BOPT_STAT_CD = 'E' THEN 1 ELSE S.COM_CD_NUM_VAL END ) RSDN_FCST

ORDER BY PRJT_NM, IBIZ_CUST_NM(APRJ.LAST_CUST_ID)-- 정렬조건 고객명+프로젝트명
ORDER BY FCST_YAM,PRJT_NM -- 정렬조건 발생시기
ORDER BY WCT_PRBB_CD DESC, CNTR_DATE, LAST_CUST_NM, PRJT_NM -- 정렬기준: 수주가능성

AND DEPT_ID IN (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM HMST110T --★조회조건: 하위부서 포함 WHERE SELL_OCR_YN = 'Y' -- 매출발생부서 START WITH DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND CRIT_YEAR = #{critYear} --★조회조건: 영업부서 CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = HGRK_DEPT_ID AND PRIOR CRIT_YEAR = CRIT_YEAR) GROUP BY CC.BRSL_DST_CD, A.BRSL_DTL_DST_CD --, CC.BRSL_DTL_DST_CD_NM, CC.BRSL_DST_CD ORDER BY CC.BRSL_DST_CD, A.BRSL_DTL_DST_CD ) V, ( SELECT SORT_SEQC AS RSL_DST_SEQC, --정렬순서를 가져오기 위해 FUNCTION을 사용하지 않고 직접 Query C10.COM_CD BRSL_DST_CD, C10.COM_CD_NM BRSL_DST_CD_NM FROM ACOM020T C20, ACOM010T C10 WHERE C20.CLMN_NM = 'BRSL_DST_CD' --사업실적구분코드 AND C20.COM_GRP_CD = C10.COM_GRP_CD AND C10.USE_YN = 'Y' ) BC WHERE BC.BRSL_DST_CD = V.BRSL_DST_CD(+) ORDER BY BC.RSL_DST_SEQC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT, ROWNUM AS ROWNUMBER, Z.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.PRJT_ID, IBIZ_PRJT_NM(A.PRJT_ID) AS PRJT_NM, A.SEQ, LAST_CUST_ID, IBIZ_CUST_NM(LAST_CUST_ID) AS LAST_CUST_NM, PRJT_TYPE_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PRJT_TYPE_CD', PRJT_TYPE_CD) AS PRJT_TYPE_CD_NM, B.BEXC_START_DATE, B.BEXC_END_DATE, SLS_DEPT_ID, IBIZ_DEPT_NM(SLS_DEPT_ID) AS SLS_DEPT_NM, SLS_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(SLS_EMP_ID) AS SLS_EMP_NM, PRJT_STAT_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('PRJT_STAT_CD', PRJT_STAT_CD) AS PRJT_STAT_CD_NM, BSNS_DEPT_ID, IBIZ_DEPT_NM(BSNS_DEPT_ID) AS BSNS_DEPT_NM, BSNS_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(BSNS_EMP_ID) AS BSNS_EMP_NM, A.BSNS_PRGS_STAT_CD, IBIZ_COM_CD_NM('BSNS_PRGS_STAT_CD', A.BSNS_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS BSNS_PRGS_STAT_CD_NM, REG_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(REG_EMP_ID) AS REG_EMP_NM, REG_DT, CHG_EMP_ID, IBIZ_EMP_NM(CHG_EMP_ID) AS CHG_EMP_NM, CHG_DT, E.SORT_SEQC FROM BPRJ000T A LEFT JOIN (SELECT PRJT_ID, LAST_CUST_ID, PRJT_TYPE_CD, BEXC_START_DATE, BEXC_END_DATE, SLS_DEPT_ID, SLS_EMP_ID, PRJT_STAT_CD FROM APRJ000T) B ON A.PRJT_ID = B.PRJT_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT PRJT_ID, SEQ, BSNS_RPRT_START_DATE, BSNS_RPRT_END_DATE, RPRT_YN, BSNS_PRGS_STAT_CD FROM BPRJ010T) D ON A.PRJT_ID = D.PRJT_ID AND A.SEQ = D.SEQ LEFT JOIN (SELECT COM_CD, COM_CD_NM, SORT_SEQC FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD = (SELECT COM_GRP_CD FROM ACOM020T WHERE CLMN_NM = 'BSNS_PRGS_STAT_CD' )) E ON A.BSNS_PRGS_STAT_CD = E.COM_CD WHERE 1= 1

AND ( BSNS_DEPT_ID IN ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM HMST100T START WITH HGRK_DEPT_ID = #{bsnsDeptId} CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = HGRK_DEPT_ID ) OR BSNS_DEPT_ID = #{bsnsDeptId} ) --★ 검색조건: 사업부서ID

AND ( BSNS_RPRT_START_DATE <= #{endDate} OR BSNS_RPRT_END_DATE <= #{endDate} OR (D.BSNS_PRGS_STAT_CD = 'H' AND RPRT_YN = 'Y') ) --★ 보고기간

ORDER BY IBIZ_PRJT_NM(A.PRJT_ID) ASC, IBIZ_CUST_NM(LAST_CUST_ID) ASC, E.SORT_SEQC ASC, REG_DT DESC --★ 정렬기준: 프로젝트명
ORDER BY E.SORT_SEQC ASC, IBIZ_PRJT_NM(A.PRJT_ID) ASC, IBIZ_CUST_NM(LAST_CUST_ID) ASC, REG_DT DESC --★ 정렬기준: 사업진행상태
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC, IBIZ_PRJT_NM(A.PRJT_ID), IBIZ_CUST_NM(LAST_CUST_ID) ASC, E.SORT_SEQC ASC--★ 정렬기준: 등록일
) Z ) WHERE ROWNUMBER BETWEEN #{pageSize} * (#{pageNumber} - 1) + 1 AND #{pageSize} * (#{pageNumber} - 1) + #{pageSize}

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT APRJ.LAST_CUST_ID, RSL.FCST_PAL_ID, RSL.PROD_DST_CD AS PROD_DST_CD, RSL.PROD_TYPE_CD, RSL.GODS_CLSF_CD, RSL.SELL_AMT ,-- SUM_BEST.SUM_SELL_AMT, RSL.RATE, APRJ.PRJT_TYPE_CD, CNTR.CNTR_ID, CNTR.CNTR_YAM, CNTR.PRJT_ID, CNTR.SLS_DEPT_ID ,CNTR.SLS_EMP_ID, CNTR.CNTR_AMT FROM ( SELECT BEST.FCST_PAL_ID, (SELECT HGRK_COM_CD FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD ='PM04' AND COM_CD = BEST.PROD_TYPE_CD) AS PROD_DST_CD, BEST.PROD_TYPE_CD, BEST.GODS_CLSF_CD, BEST.SELL_AMT ,-- SUM_BEST.SUM_SELL_AMT, CASE WHEN NVL(SUM_BEST.SUM_SELL_AMT,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(BEST.SELL_AMT/SUM_BEST.SUM_SELL_AMT,0) END AS RATE FROM ( SELECT BE02.FCST_PAL_ID,SUM(BE02.SELL_AMT) AS SUM_SELL_AMT FROM BEST020T BE02 WHERE 1=1 AND GODS_CLSF_CD != 'AL' GROUP BY BE02.FCST_PAL_ID ) SUM_BEST JOIN ( SELECT BE02.FCST_PAL_ID, BE02.PROD_TYPE_CD, BE02.GODS_CLSF_CD, BE02.SELL_AMT FROM BEST020T BE02 WHERE 1=1 AND GODS_CLSF_CD != 'AL' ) BEST ON SUM_BEST.FCST_PAL_ID = BEST.FCST_PAL_ID
) RSL -- BEST020T 기반 비율 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRJT_ID, CNTR_ID, FCST_PAL_ID, SUM(CNTR_AMT) AS CNTR_AMT, SUBSTR(CNTR_DATE,1,6) AS CNTR_YAM, SLS_DEPT_ID, SLS_EMP_ID FROM WMST000T CNTR GROUP BY PRJT_ID, CNTR_ID, FCST_PAL_ID, SUBSTR(CNTR_DATE,1,6), SLS_DEPT_ID, SLS_EMP_ID ) CNTR -- 계약금액, 계약정보 ON RSL.FCST_PAL_ID = CNTR.FCST_PAL_ID JOIN ( SELECT HGRK_COM_CD,COM_CD FROM ACOM010T WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'PM08' ) ACOM ON ACOM.COM_CD = RSL.GODS_CLSF_CD JOIN APRJ000T APRJ ON CNTR.PRJT_ID = APRJ.PRJT_ID WHERE CNTR.CNTR_YAM BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} -- 조회조건_기간

AND ACOM.HGRK_COM_CD = #{bsnsClsfCd} -- 조회조건_사업분류
